DOC.brief_summary: Background : Menstrual disturbance major complain reproductive age woman , clinical biochemical characteristic woman different menstrual disturbance well-understood . Objective : To study clinical biochemical characteristic woman oligomenorrhea , amenorrhea , premature ovarian failure . Method : Retrospective study , medical record review patient visited outpatient clinic Reproductive Medicine Taipei Medical University - Wan Fang Hospital form 2009 Jan. 1 2011 Nov. 31 . Including criterion : Patients sufficient medical record ( anthropometric , endocrine , metabolic , lipid parameter ) age less 45 . Excluding criterion : ( 1 ) Women experience menarche < 3 year begin study ; ( 2 ) Women receive hormone drug major medical disease ; ( 3 ) Women present ovarian cyst ovarian tumor , uterine abnormality ; ( 4 ) Women > 45 year old .
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Biochemical Characteristics Women With Different Menstrual Pattern
DOC.criteria: Patients sufficient medical record ( anthropometric , endocrine , metabolic , lipid parameter ) age less 45 . 1 . Women experience menarche < 3 year begin study ; 2 . Women receive hormone drug major medical disease ; 3 . Women present ovarian cyst ovarian tumor , uterine abnormality ; 4 . Women > 45 year old .
